newsitem.title: UK: BFI up two, fresh fixing slow.
newsitem.headline: BFI up two, fresh fixing slow.

text.p: The Baltic Freight Index (BFI) rose two points on Tuesday to 1,467 points while the twice weekly Handy-index rose 23 points to 1,039.
Brokers reported EMC's recent 54,000 heavy grain USGulf to Japan Mar 7/21 was fixed at $25.85 no combination (amended from $25.75).
Elsewhere Jewel I 65,402 dwt was taken by Panocean delivery Santos March for 3/5 months at $12,350 daily plus $250,000 bonus.

ADM fixed 23,500 meals USGulf to Ireland Feb 15/23 at $15.75 while Elikon 28,234 dwt was recently taken by Canadian Forest delivery UK/Cont Feb 15/20 for 6/8 months $6,250 daily upto mid April thereafter $7,250 daily, brokers said.
At 1300 GMT BIFFEX was 10 to 20 points lower and turnover totalled 20 lots.
